en-CH.create-your-qr-flyer-description: Make sure all your guests participate. Download, print and distribute your QR flyer at your wedding. As a premium user you can personalize your QR flyer by entering your names and choosing your favourite design before downloading.
en-CH.name-card-event-title: Change your event name to personalize the app.
en-CH.edit-cover-event-description: This image will be displayed in the app
en-CH.card-access-download-description: You will need the app to upload photos.
en-CH.card-access-id-description: You can access your event in the app with this ID or with your QR code.
en-CH.card-access-invite-description: Invite your guests to make sure they download the app.
en-CH.card-slideshow-text: With the slideshow fun is guaranteed. Every photo uploaded from the app will appear live on your screen.
en-CH.card-slideshow-start-description: You need at least 4 images to start the slideshow.
en-CH.flyer-card-event-description: Select your flyer design. Print and distribute it at your wedding.
en-CH.tutorial-option1-subTitle: With this flyer you and your guests can access the event with the SamSaidYes app.
en-CH.tutorial-option2-subTitle: With the SamSaidYes app you can scan your personal QR code and start uploading photos from your smartphone immediately.
en-CH.tutorial-option3-subTitle: The sooner your guests are informed the more will participate and share amazing photos with you.
en-CH.edit-cover-description: This image will be displayed in the app
en-CH.payment-get-ssy-premium: Get SamSaidYes Premium. Click here. [show only if less than 50 images and free]
en-CH.payment-get-ssy-premium-2: Get {numberOfImages} hight resolution images. Click here to upgrade to SamSaidYes Premium [show only if more than 50 images and free]
en-CH.payment-get-ssy-premium-3: to upgrade to SamSaidYes Premium [show only if more than 50 images and free]
en-CH.premium-characteristic-element1-subTitle: Something about the live slideshow and how it works and why user needs it
en-CH.premium-characteristic-element2-subTitle: Something about the live slideshow and how it works and why user needs it
en-CH.premium-characteristic-element3-subTitle: Something about the live slideshow and how it works and why user needs it
en-CH.payment-intro-ssy-premium: Short Intro on why to buy SSY Premium and say that is a one-time payment
en-CH.presentation-card-description: With the slideshow fun is guaranteed. Every photo uploaded from the app will appear live on your screen.
en-CH.slideshow-description: You need at least 4 images to start the slideshow.
en-CH.slideshow-description-premium: Click here to start your slideshow
en-CH.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this image?
en-CH.invite-guest-message-subtitle: You want to make sure, you get many great photos? Invite your guests now so they will download the app and are ready for your event
en-CH.invite-guest-textarea-default-text: Hi! We are using the photo app SamSaidYes at our wedding. Let´s share all the photos of the wedding live with this app. We invite you to download the SamSaidYes app here (https://www.samsaidyes.com/app). With the event id {secret}, you can already access our event we can't wait to see our wedding from your perspective. Hugs.
